section1.content1: House of Wardians is a strategic auto-battle game focused on managing and evolving fighters.
section1.content2: Designed to deliver a deep yet accessible experience, HoW blends RPG, collecting and customization with asynchronous multiplayer ideal for mobile sessions.

features.title: Tactical gameplay
features.text: Prepare your team with smart combinations. Battles are automatic, but strategy makes the difference.

features.title: Master your Wardians
features.text: Recruit, train and evolve unique creatures. Each Wardian has skills to tailor your builds.

features.title: Full customization
features.text: Change the style and arsenal of your Wardians. Explore unique combinations with your own tactical approach.

features.title: Game modes
features.text: Compete in the league or challenge friends. Play fast or deep, you choose your fight.

features.title: Barrier-free multiplayer
features.text: Battle other players without simultaneous connection. Play at your own pace and keep progressing.

features.title: Constant progression
features.text: Every match makes you stronger. Improve fighters, earn trophies and unlock rewards with nonstop evolution.

questions.question: WHAT IS HOUSE OF WARDIANS?
questions.answer: House of Wardians is a project inspired by the old browser game 'El Bruto'...

questions.question: WHAT PLATFORMS WILL IT BE AVAILABLE ON?
questions.answer: The game is designed exclusively for mobile devices, both Android and iOS.

questions.question: WILL MORE CONTENT BE ADDED?
questions.answer: Absolutely! This is just a first version...

questions.question: WILL THE GAME BE FREE?
questions.answer: Yes, downloading and playing House of Wardians will be completely free...

questions.question: HOW CAN I WIN MORE FIGHTS?
questions.answer: Although combat is automatic, the player has a big impact through strategy and preparation...

questions.question: WILL I KEEP MY WARDIANS WHEN VERSION 1.0 LAUNCHES?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, no. During the alpha and beta phases, major changes are expected...
